name: Torment (itch) (Sticc)
description:
A horror game made by a group of 4 students during a university minor. 

•Torment is a first-person psychological horror set in the Victorian Era. 
•The player plays as Anabelle, a woman in her mid-twenties, who has constant nightmares about a specific house on the outskirts of London. 
•Anabelle has no memories of the first 5 years of her life. However, after entering and inspecting the house, she starts discovering the history of the house and her connection to it.  

Controls:

WASD - movement

E - interact with objects
